subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal defeated fourth-seeded Andy Murray, 6-2, 7-6 (4), to reach the final of the Monte Carlo Masters in Monaco. Nadal extended his winning streak at Monte Carlo to 26 matches and stayed on course for a fifth straight title. Nadal will play third-seeded Novak Djokovic in Sunday’s final. Djokovic beat Stanislas Wawrinka of Switzerland, 4-6, 6-1, 6-3. ¶Caroline Wozniacki advanced to the final of the Family Circle Cup in Charleston, S.C., by holding on to beat top-seeded Elena Dementieva, 6-4, 5-7, 7-5. Wozniacki will face 16th-seeded Sabine Lisicki, who defeated sixth-seeded Marion Bartoli, 6-3, 6-1. family (AP).
